name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering robust backend solutions for financial platforms and SaaS applications. Specializing in **AI**, **generative AI**, and technical strategy for advanced system reliability. Highly skilled in developing high-performance backend architectures and APIs using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**), while leveraging cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven expertise in collaboration and problem-solving, successfully optimizing platforms and leading implementations for top-tier organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

• Developed and implemented **AI** and **generative AI** solutions to enhance backend services and provide intelligent automation for user onboarding and reporting workflows.
• Engineered robust **SaaS** applications using **FastAPI** and **Python**, achieving **30%** faster processing times for document automation.
• Leveraged **backend** and **data analytics** skills to create data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely data delivery with a **99.9%** accuracy rate.
• Implemented event-driven architectures using **Celery** and **Redis**, processing financial transactions asynchronously and improving response time by **20%**.
• Deployed and maintained microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to optimize cloud resource management.
• Conducted system reliability assessments and integrated secure authentication systems using **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, enhancing platform security for **over 100,000** users.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to address integration challenges, optimize platform performance, and ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to enhance document workflows, achieving a **25%** increase in user onboarding speed.
• Engineered event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing for over **10,000** transactions monthly.
• Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring a consistent and scalable environment across **5** applications.
• Designed data pipelines for secure exchange of regulatory data, leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, which reduced data processing time by **30%**.
• Conducted thorough security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication, servicing over **1,000** users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to promote successful system integration, enhance regulatory compliance, and achieve on-time release management for **4** major projects.

• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to integrate data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, facilitating seamless user interaction with the platform while improving API response times by **30%**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, along with strict adherence to internal data security protocols, maintaining system integrity for **99.99%** uptime.
• Implemented extensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock server technologies, optimizing QA and CI processes, which accelerated development cycles by **40%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, significantly optimizing backend task execution and improving process management efficiency by **25%**.
